mapper.insert: insert into prod_perf_add (perf_id, item_code, item_name, perf_gobd, err_reason, remark, pfQTY, perf_date) values (#{perf_id}, #{item_code}, #{item_name}, #{perf_gobd}, #{err_reason}, #{remark}, #{pfQTY}, #{perf_date})
mapper.select: SELECT a.perf_id, a.item_code, a.item_name, a.perf_gobd, a.err_reason, a.remark, a.pfQTY, a.perf_date FROM prod_perf_add a LEFT OUTER JOIN prod_perf_list l ON 1=1 WHERE wo_code=#{wo_code }
